job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description:
Summary:

Our client, a successful Medical Device company, is seeking a talented Senior Software Engineer to join their team. This exciting company is well known for their innovative and collaborative approach to deliver fresh, breakthrough technology to power the future of healthcare. In this role as a Senior Software Engineer you will apply technical expertise towards developing world-class solutions using software engineering tools to solve complex technical problems related to surgical navigation, robotics, and ablation products. This role would require either relocation or commute to office near Denver, Colorado area.


Job Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, test, and document complex software components, and applications related to surgical navigation, robotics, and ablation products using C++ and/or C#
  • Troubleshoot, debug, maintain, and support existing products
  • Execute on key success metrics in engineering and product roadmap
  • Work in an Agile team environment


Skills Required:

  • 4+ years of professional engineering experience
  • Proven expertise in C++ and/or C# with .NET framework
  • Experience with other programming languages: Python, Go, Java
  • Experience in large-scale software design including OOA/OOD and design patterns


Contact Details:

The full job description and company details are available upon application. This position is being handled by James at Meet, call +1 (628) 336-2774 or email james.giusti@peoplewithchemistry.com to discuss further and in confidence.
